analysis: As an Aries, you also have a sense of competitiveness and a bold and fiery undercurrent.
You also have a serene, grounded aura as a Taurus, and can come across as down to earth.
As a Gemini, you have a sense of dynamism and playfulness. Some might see your adaptable nature as two-faced, unfortunately.
You can be quite sensitive and emotional, but as a Cancer, you also have a practical instinct.
As a Leo, you also have an energetic and confident spirit that draws others to you.
Your conscientiousness might be noticeable to others, as a Virgo, but generally, you are quite reserved and less conspicuous.
As a Libra, you are friendly and diplomatic, but can also be somewhat overly whimsical in the eyes of others.
You have a deeply passionate nature that can be polarizing, as a Scorpio, which contributes to the intensity that you can give off.
As a Sagittarius, you are generally honest and straightforward to others, but you also have a joyous optimism about you that can charm people easily.
You come across as very practical and self-disciplined to others, as Capricorn, sometimes overly so.
As an Aquarius, you are loyal and friendly, which is what draws others to you. However, you can also come across as emotionally detached.
You have a wild imagination and an idealisitc disposition that makes your selflessness seem saintlike, as a Pisces.
